00045 class CSwordModuleInfo  {
00046 public:
00047     enum type { Bible, Commentary, Lexicon, GenericBook, Unknown };
00048 //  enum TextDirection {
00049 //      LTR = 0, /*LTR = Left to right*/        
00050 //      RTL /*RTL = Right To Left*/
00051 //  };
00056   enum unlockErrorCode {
00057         noError,    /* No error occured, everything worked ok. The key was written to the config*/
00058         wrongUnlockKey, /* The wrong key was used. Module is not unlocked */                
00059         notLocked, /* The module was not locked so it can't be unlocked */
00060         noPermission /* The key was not written to config because we have no permissions*/
00061     };  
00062     CSwordModuleInfo( CSwordBackend* backend, SWModule* module );
00063     CSwordModuleInfo( const CSwordModuleInfo& m );  
00064     virtual ~CSwordModuleInfo();    
00068   CSwordBackend* backend() const;
00072   SWModule* module() const;
00077   const CSwordModuleInfo::unlockErrorCode unlock( const QString& unlockKey );
00085   CHTMLEntryDisplay* getDisplay() const;
00090   const QString getCipherKey() const;
00096   const bool isEncrypted() const;
00101   const bool isLocked();
00105   const QString getPath() const;
00110   const QString getVersion() const;
00114   const bool hasVersion() const;
00119   const QString getAboutInformation() const;
00123   const QString getDescription() const;
00129   virtual const bool search( const QString searchedText, const int searchOptions, ListKey scope, void (*percent)(char, void*));
00134   virtual ListKey& getSearchResult();
00138   virtual void interruptSearch();
00144   void clearSearchResult();
00150   virtual const bool supportsFeature( const CSwordBackend::moduleOptions type );
00154   virtual const CSwordModuleInfo::type getType() const;
00155 //  /**
00156 //  * Returns the text direction used in this module.
00157 //  */
00158 //  const CSwordModuleInfo::TextDirection getTextDirection();
00163   const float requiredSwordVersion();
00167   const QString name() const;
00169   const bool isUnicode();
00170     
00171 private:
00172     SWModule*   m_module;
00173     ListKey m_searchResult;
00174     CSwordBackend* m_backend;   
00175 };

00177 typedef QList<CSwordModuleInfo> ListCSwordModuleInfo;

00179 inline const CSwordModuleInfo::type CSwordModuleInfo::getType() const {
00180     return CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook;
00181 }
